definition: to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt

sentences.english: Meggie asked idly, flat on her stomach on the carpet reading a book.
sentences.chinese: 麥琪懶散地問，她正伏臥在地毯上看書。

sentences.english: I'll lay heavy sheaves at Thy feet.
sentences.chinese: 夜間我可伏臥在你的腳旁。

sentences.english: C. I'll start with 15 push-ups a day.
sentences.chinese: 我將從一天做十五個伏臥撐開始。
